scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.check:circular: npm run check:circular:backend && npm run check:circular:frontend
scripts.check:circular:backend: cd backend && npx madge --circular --extensions ts src/
scripts.check:circular:frontend: cd frontend && npx madge --circular --extensions ts,tsx src/
scripts.check:quality: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run check:circular
scripts.check:all: npm run check:quality && npm run test
